fields.name: Actions
fields.description: A collection of the actions which are triggered if all the configured rules evaluations, within at least one rule set, are true.

fields.name: IsEnabled
fields.description: Indicates whether the security automation is enabled.

fields.name: Scopes
fields.description: A collection of scopes on which the security automations logic is applied. Supported scopes are the subscription itself or a resource group under that subscription. The automation will only apply on defined scopes.

fields.name: Sources
fields.description: A collection of the source event types which evaluate the security automation set of rules.
